tpk::ICRefSys

tpk::ICRefSys Class Reference

#include <ICRefSys.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::ICRefSys:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

International Celestial Reference System.

This system is not yet supported by the kernel and is approximated by FK5/2000.0.

Public Member Functions
